readable.title: 2906054175_e33af79522
readable.content: A group of men hold a drum over their heads with a man standing on it . A man wearing no shirt begins to jump from a drum into a crowd of others . Man without shirt standing on top of a drum that people are holding in the air . One musician is standing on a musical drum which has been lifted in the air by a few people at the concert and another musician is playing another musical instrument . The long haired man is balancing on a drum that is being carried by men in white shirts .
